Params[3]: For our final session, Commandant, we will be doing field testing today.
Although it's called field testing, we'll only be tackling a mission that seems doable by myself.

Params[4]: Can you handle them all on your own?

Params[3]: (Nods) They're just some low-level Corrupted.
I'll be fine. I've already done my pre-battle preparations.
So... here I go!
Urgh...!
This Corrupted...

Params[2]: Isn't it the one that got away last time?

Params[3]: The Corrupted who escaped because of my mistake... Good... Let me show you what I've learnt!
I'll help.

Params[2]: Wait, Liv! Let's contact Lucia and Lee first!

Params[3]: That's not necessary... I've completed my calculation on this Corrupted as well!
That's not necessary... You just have to observe like before, Commandant.
First, I'll step back...
Got it!
Steady... Aim the Levi-Gun forward...
It's spinning...?! That's not a move in my calculation!
Commandant?!
Levi-Gun ready! Minimum firing distance reached! Fire!
...Urgh!—!
We've defeated it...
But I still had to rely on you in the end, Commandant...
If I want to contribute instead of dragging you behind, I'll have to accomplish something on my own without you...

Params[2]: But if you could do that, you wouldn't need me anymore.
Params[4]: I would love to have you rely on me.

Params[3]: Ah... I didn't say I don't need you... Hmm.
Commandant, you always undermine my goal like this!
...You're such a crafty person.
Then... before I can stand on my own...
Will you please watch over me, Commandant?
